casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey L. WRIGHT. No. 615P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of November 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review Pursuant to N.C.G.S 7A-31 (B)(1)(2)(3)":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
